text: Dark City is a 1950 American crime drama movie directed by William Dieterle and was based on the story No Escape by Larry Marcus. It stars Charlton Heston, Lizabeth Scott, Dean Jagger, Ed Begley, Harry Morgan, Jack Webb, Viveca Lindfors and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1950 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by William Dieterle Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies about suicide Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Dark City (1950 movie)
